text: Hi John, have you heard anything about Mr. Thompson? He hasn't been around lately, and I'm getting worried. I remember that he is your former boss and you are working in the community heath center as a nurse, so I guess you know something.
John, I baked some cookies for you. Stop by when you have time!
Did you see the news about the flu going around? Hope our seniors are okay.
I'm organizing a book club meeting next week. Would love for you to join!
